options: -- "p" means the difficulty of the machine (payout miltiplier) 5 slot machine: - set to 1-2 for HARD level - set to 4 for MEDIUM level - set to 6-10 for EASY level 3 slot machine: - set to 1 for HARD level - set to 2 for MEDIUM level - set to 3-10 for EASY level -- "game_type" means the type of machine - set to 5 for 5-SLOT - set to 3 for 3-SLOT
